comment: She has a very bubbly personality and seems to be passionate about her career. Everyday we did practice role plays. there are 2 pop quizzes that are 5 points each on a scale of a 100, so they can determine if you get an A in her class. Her test are okay ,the final was kind of rough. There were a few papers and one project. You will earn your grade.
Awesome class and teacher is very informative and helpful. Don't expect to ever get out of class early.

Very nice professor, kind of spacey at times, but that's just her personality. She told very interesting stories that you can relate to the material. Not a hard class at all. Passed with an A and never cracked open the book. Just show up to class, pay attention and participate. You will do fine. 2 Papers, 2 Test (A combo of MC, Short answer. TF).

I absolutely loved Mrs. Nash. I usually never write reviews but I had to for her. She cares A LOT and is very inspiring when it comes to helping children. There was one assignment that we all felt was  unclear, yet overall she was great. I had her for Cultural Competence as well during the same semester. Wish I could take her for all my classes!!!
she really cares and wants you to learn and succeed.

Wonderful teacher! Extremely nice and extremely helpful! I took her class in the summer and it was so fun because we had a very small class. She is an amazing teacher. She has so much experience in the field. Great teacher!!
